title: Aaron (it) Out
description:
Mina talks to NFL Network's Gregg Rosenthal about Aaron Rodgers testing positive for COVID and the implications for Green Bay's game against the Chiefs, the social media post by Odell Beckham, Jr.'s dad and which teams OBJ may play for next, the Saints without Jameis Winston and Michael Thomas for the rest of the season, and then they hash out a list of the top five defenses in the NFL.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Omaha Productions, Mina Kimes
